entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Val-des-Monts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

Dewpoint: -34.9°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
